summary: The ALPHA Collaboration is a group of physicists from about 11 universities who work together  to try to trap neutral antimatter.
full_text: The Antiproton Decelerator  is a storage ring at the CERN laboratory in Geneva. It was built as a successor to the Low Energy Antiproton Ring  and started operation in the year 2000. The decelerated antiprotons are ejected to one of several connected experiments.
title: ALPHA Collaboration
